  settings: {
    analysis: {
      analyzer: {
        wildcard_prefix: {
          type: "custom",
          tokenizer: "standard",
          filter: ["lowercase", "wildcard_edge_ngram"],
        },
      },
      filter: {
        wildcard_edge_ngram: {
          type: "edge_ngram",
          min_gram: 1,
          max_gram: 32,
        },
      },
    },
  },
  mappings: {
    properties: {
      query: {
        type: "percolator",
      },

        type: "text",

          prefix: {
            type: "text",
